name: Robert G. LENHARDT and Jean A. Lenhardt, his wife, Appellees, v. Chelsie I. ADAMS, Irene K. Noss and Louis Noss & Noss Mobile Homes, Inc., Appellants
docket_number: Appeal No. 051 Western District Appeal Docket 1995

judges: Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Robert G. LENHARDT and Jean A. Lenhardt, his wife, Appellees, v. Chelsie I. ADAMS, Irene K. Noss and Louis Noss & Noss Mobile Homes, Inc., Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
NIX, C.J., and NEWMAN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: James E. Kelly, Jr., for Chelsie Adams, Irene Noss, Louis Noss & Noss Mobile Homes, Inc.
James R. Silvis, Greensburg, for Robert & Jean Lenhardt.
casebody.head_matter:
672 A.2d 785
Robert G. LENHARDT and Jean A. Lenhardt, his wife, Appellees, v. Chelsie I. ADAMS, Irene K. Noss and Louis Noss & Noss Mobile Homes, Inc., Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 5, 1996.
Decided March 18, 1996.
James E. Kelly, Jr., for Chelsie Adams, Irene Noss, Louis Noss & Noss Mobile Homes, Inc.
James R. Silvis, Greensburg, for Robert & Jean Lenhardt.
Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
